Question: In the Memphis Mafia's defense, Marty Lacker has said, "[this person] was his own man. ..
Hints: On March 24, this person was inducted into the U.S Army as a private at Fort Chaffee, near Fort Smith, Arkansas.
On January 10, 1956, this person made his first recordings for RCA in Nashville.
In late April, this person began a two-week residency at the New Frontier Hotel and Casino on the Las Vegas Strip.
